title: Why is the comment section of the song 'If I can't have you,' by Shawn Mendes full with the phrase 'Kisses from Poland?' What does that mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: Basically when Shawn Mendes new song dropped named if I can’t have u it only then had roughly over a million of views and 50K comments fans from Poland starting going crazy and saying things like “Poland loves u” “watching from Poland” “kisses from Poland” etc and this is how “kisses from Poland”exploded and went viral then fans from over the world stole the phrase and started using it haha fans are crazy in Poland and no I’m not from Poland I’m from Czechia  which is similar to Poland we love u poland love from our Slavic brothers and sisters ❤️﻿
